title: Allocation of the lands belonging to the Urban Development Authority (UDA) for development
decision_details: - The Cabinet has decided on 2020 02 07 to confer authority on the Board of Management of the Urban Development Authority for leasing out lands not exceeding 1 acre within the District of Colombo and lands not exceeding 2 acres, outside the District of Colombo, belonging to the Urban Development Authority.  Accordingly, the information provided by the Hon. Prime Minister in his capacity as the Minister of Urban Development, Water Supply and Housing Facilities, regarding the progress made on the 23 plots of land disposed during the period from 2016 to 2019 with the approval of the Minister in charge of the subject under section 18(1) of the Urban Development Authority Act, No.41 of 1978, having approved by the Board of Management of the UDA, was noted by the Cabinet.
